title: HOW TO: DIY self watering system for plants or trees || Agrosuede

tasks.task: Implementing a self-watering bottle system for plants
subtasks: Cutting the top off a bottle
Drilling a hole in the cover of another bottle
Connecting the bottles using thread, string, or rope
Placing the plant in the system and ensuring proper water movement
Monitoring moisture levels and adjusting the system as needed

tasks.task: Creating a wicking fabric system for plant hydration
subtasks: Soaking a cotton cloth in water
Positioning the soaked cloth in a plant pot to wick moisture upward
Placing a plant in the pot and observing growth
Adjusting the system to maintain consistent moisture levels

tasks.task: Innovating garden irrigation techniques
subtasks: Researching and understanding the principles of moving water from high to low concentration
Experimenting with different materials for water movement
Applying knowledge to create adaptable and cost-effective watering solutions
